Summary: Hovering ball of pink/orange light that looked like a planet; through binoculars shifted from orange to red.
divs: sighting detailsi was in a room upstairs in which there is a window that overlooks sunset cove. directly across the water, i saw a pinkish-orange ball of light in the night sky. it was stationary\hovering and its light was reflected in the water. at first i thought it was a planet, but it seemed too low in the sky for that. i was a little nervous, as i had never quite seen anything like this in the night sky before. through my binoculars i noticed that its color was changing from orange to red and back again. after a while i noticed that it had receded and its light trail in the water had faded, as if it was moving away from me in the exact opposite direction. i observed this ball of light for about an hour on and off as i moved through the house. eventually it was gone, but it appeared to have faded into the distance rather than suddenly speeding away. i made a few phone calls to family members regarding the experience before i filed this report.
